word_mean: 定量的，数量的：指或表示量的
与量的比例或与某化合物各成分的量有关的

sentence.Network_en: That's the whole difference between quantitative and qualitative research.
sentence.Network_cn: 那就是定量研究和定性研究之间的重大差别。

sentence.Network_en: He said it was only a quantitative difference.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说这仅仅是数量上的差别.

sentence.Network_en: Business graduates must also be numerate, because most degrees will have courses in quantitative methods and statistics.
sentence.Network_cn: 商科专业大学毕业生也必须具备良好的数学能力, 因为大部分学位涉及定量研究法和统计学领域课程.

list.abs: 国际贸易中的数量限制(Quantitative Restrictions)是一种最为普遍的、对国际贸易危害最大的非关税的贸易限制措施，也是总协定当年 …
细胞遗传学~~基础 - 豆丁网 ... 遗传进展 genetic gain 数量遗传学 quantitative genetics 阈模型 threshold model.
外贸数量英语 Quantity | 英语大学 ... quantity of sale 销售量 quantitative analysis 数量分析 quantitative value 数值.
量化宽松(quantitative easing)，主要是指中央银行在实行零利率或近似零利率政策后，通过购买国债等中长期债券，增加基础货币供 …
所谓“定量宽松”(Quantitative Easing)，是由日本最早提出的一个概念，就是指利率接近或者达到零的情况下，央行通过购买各种债券…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'having magnitude or spatial extent'): from medieval Latin quantitativus, from Latin quantitas (see quantity)

entry.tran: 大小的；数量的;与数量有关的
entry.def: Quantitative means relating to different sizes or amounts of things.

example.ex: ...the advantages of quantitative and qualitative research.
example.tran: 定量研究与定性研究的优势

means.word_mean: 1. expressible as a quantity or relating to or susceptible of measurement;

sentences.sentence: "quantitative analysis determines the amounts and proportions of the chemical constituents of a substance or mixture"

means.word_mean: 2. relating to the measurement of quantity;
3. (of verse) having a metric system based on relative duration of syllables;

sentences.sentence: "in typical Greek and Latin verse of the classical period the rhymic system is based on some arrangement of long and short elements"

stems_affixes.word_buile: quantity[n.量, 数量]+ative表形容词→quantitative数量的
quant多少,数量+ity表名词→n.量, 数量

stems_affixes.value_cn: 量, 额, [物] 量子, 量子论
stems_affixes.word_buile: quant多少,数量+um→n.量, 额, [物] 量子, 量子论
quant多少,数量+ify……化→v.确定数量 v.量化
